N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7870.4 - Written notice to customer

State Regulations
(a) No
distributor shall impose a suspension or termination of regularly scheduled
deliveries, as defined in section
7870.1
(n) of this

Part, unless such distributor provides the customer with written notice
containing the information required by subdivision (b) of this section not less
than three calendar days prior to the date of suspension or termination is to
take effect. (b) The written notice
shall: (1)
notify the customer of the cutoff
and the reason for it; and
(2)
inform the customer that assistance may be available from a social services
district office, and provide the name, address and telephone number of the
designated social services district office listed in Appendix BB-6 of this

Title for the municipality or county in which the residential building involved
is located. Notes
